articles.description: SpiceJet Chairman and Managing Director Ajay Singh said at the company's AGM the airline is looking to expand its network and emerge as a stronger player. Shares of SpiceJet Ltd ended at ₹65.44, up by ₹3.24, or 5.21%, on the BSE.
articles.content:
SpiceJet Chairman and Managing Director Ajay Singh on Wednesday (January 10) unveiled the airline's ambitious plans for growth and network expansion, propelled by a fund infusion of 2,250 crore.
